name: Matinta Perera
description: It is an old witch who at night turns into an ominous bird that perches on the walls and roofs of houses and starts to whistle, and only stops when the resident, already very enraged by the shrill whistle, promises her something to stop (usually tobacco, but it can also be coffee, cachaça or fish). Thus, the morning stops and flies, and the next day goes to the house of the disturbed resident to collect the agreed. If the promised is denied, a disgrace happens in the house of the one who made the unfulfilled promise. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
